Hello,

I'm using Windows 8 within IE10 and when I try to execute a Retrieve I get this: Error: Object doesn't support property or method 'selectSingleNode'.

I tried the same exacly code using Windows 2008 within IE9 and it works.

I tried the same using Firefox and nothing happens. I'm using Firefox because UR12.

 

Do you have any information if you code should work for these browsers?

Is there any workaround?

 

Your scripts are very good. Congratulations.

Thanks,

Diego

Currently the script doesn't support cross-browser, we are looking for some cycle to update the script to make it cross-browser compatible. An update will be coming in the next couple of days. 

Thanks,

Daniel
